summary: A training script that demonstrates how to build and train a Hard Graph Attention Network (HardGAT) on citation graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed) using DGL and PyTorch, with support for command‑line configuration, accuracy evaluation, and early stopping.
business_intent: Provide developers and researchers with a ready‑to‑run example for experimenting with hard attention mechanisms in graph neural networks, enabling quick benchmarking and reproducibility on standard citation datasets.
